text: each other in their yearning for the same thing.
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: only with one sweet look. Already for a long time would he fain
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: have come to the queen's tent if he had not been kept elsewhere.
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: Delay displeased him much, so soon as ever he could he came to
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: the queen in her tent. The queen has met him; for she knew much
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: of his thought without his ever having spoken; but well had she
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: perceived it. As he enters the tent she salutes him and takes
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: pains to greet him with due ceremony; well she knows what
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: occasion brings him. Because she wishes to serve him to his
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

title: Cliges: A Romance

title: Cliges: A Romance

title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: seated between them and begins a discourse which came aptly and
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: in season.
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: "Alexander," quoth the queen, "Love is worse than hatred, for it
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: grieves and bewilders its devotee. Lovers know not what they do
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: when the one hides his feelings from the other. In Love there is
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: much grievous toil: he who does not make a bold beginning in the
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: laying of the foundation can scarce put on the coping-stone. The
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: saying goes that there is nothing so difficult to cross as the
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: threshold. I wish to instruct you about Love; for well I know
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: that Love is using you badly. For this reason have I taken you to
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: task; and take care that you conceal nought of it from me, for
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: hearts you have made one. Never seek to hide it from me. You act
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: very foolishly in that the twain of you tell not your thoughts;
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: for you are killing each other by this concealment; you will be
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: Love's murderers. Now, I counsel you that you seek not to satisfy
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: your love by rape or by lust. Unite yourselves in honourable
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: marriage. Thus as it seems to me your love will last long. I
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: venture to assure you of this, that if you have a mind for it I
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: will bring about the marriage."
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

title: Cliges: A Romance

text: disclosed his. "Lady," quoth he, "I deny nought whereof you
title: Cliges: A Romance

text: charge me; rather do I quite admit all that you say. Never do I
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: it. This that you of your pity have told me greatly pleases and
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: delights me. Since you know my will, I know not why I should any
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: longer conceal it from you. Very long ago if I had dared I would
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: have confessed it; for the concealment has pained me much. But
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: give myself to her." At these words she trembled; and she does
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: not refuse this gift. She betrays the wish of her heart both in
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

title: Cliges: A Romance

title: Cliges: A Romance

author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: brother will not dare to stand his ground when he shall see the
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: host assembled. Alexander might have led away a great force had
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: he willed. But he has no care to destroy his people if his
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: brother will answer him in such wise as to perform his promise.
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: He led away forty knights and Soredamors and his son. These two
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: would he not leave behind; for they were meet to be greatly
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: loved. They sailed from Shoreham where they took leave of the
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: whole court; they had fair winds; the ship ran much more swiftly
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: than a fleeing stag. Before the month had passed, I ween, they
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: came to anchor before Athens, a city very magnificent and strong.
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: The emperor, in sooth, was staying in the city; and there was a
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: great gathering there of the high barons of the land. As soon as
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: they were arrived Alexander sends a trusted servant into the city
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: to know if he could have a fitting welcome there or if they will
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: deny that he is their rightful lord.
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: The bearer of this message was a courteous and prudent knight
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: whom men called Acorionde, a man of wealth and eloquence; and he
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: was much esteemed in the land, for he was a native of Athens.
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: From of old his forbears had always had very high lordship in
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: the city. When he had heard told that the emperor was in the city
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: he goes to contend with him for the crown on behalf of Alexander,
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: his brother; and he cannot pardon him for that he has kept it
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: unjustly. Straight into the palace has he come; and finds many a
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: one who greets him fair; but he gives no answer nor does he say a
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: word to any man who greets him; rather he waits until he may hear
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: what will and what mind they have toward their true lord. He does
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: not stop till he reaches the emperor; he greets him not, nor bows
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: to him, nor calls him emperor. "Alis," quoth he, "I bear thee a
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: message from Alexander who is out yonder in this harbour. Hear
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: what word thy brother sends to thee: He asks of thee what is his
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: and seeks nought that is contrary to justice. Constantinople
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: which thou holdest ought to be his; and will be his. Neither
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: reasonable nor right would it be that there should be discord
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: 'twixt you twain. Take my counsel, and come to terms with him,
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: and give him the Crown in peace; for it is right meet that thou
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: yield it to him."
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: Alis replies: "Fair sweet friend, thou hast taken on thyself a
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: foolish errand in that thou hast brought this message. No comfort
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: hast thou brought to me, for I know well that my brother is dead.
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: It would be a great consolation to me if he were alive and I knew
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: it. Never will I believe it till I see him. He is dead a while
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: ago; and that is a grief to me. Not a word that thou sayest do I
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: believe. And if he is alive wherefore comes he not? Never need he
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: fear that I will not give him land in plenty. He is mad if he
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: keeps aloof from me; and if he serve me he will never be the
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: worse for it. Never will there be any man that will hold the
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: crown and the empire against me." Acorionde hears that the
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: emperor's reply is not favourable; but by no fear is he withheld
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: from speaking his mind. "Alis," quoth he, "may God confound me if
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: the matter is left thus. On thy brother's behalf I defy thee, and
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: on his behalf, as is meet, I exhort all those that I see here to
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: leave thee and come over to his side. It is meet that they cleave
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: to him; him ought they to make their lord. He who is loyal, let
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: now his loyalty appear."
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: With this word he leaves the court; and the emperor, on his side,
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: summons those in whom he most trusts. From them he seeks
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: counsel as to his brother who thus challenges him, and seeks to
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: know if he can fully trust them not to give support or aid to him
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: in this attack. Thus he hopes to prove each one; but he finds not
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: even one to cleave to him with regard to the war; rather do they
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: bid him remember the war that Eteocles waged against Polynices,
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: who was his own brother, in which the one killed the other with
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: his own hands. "A like thing may chance with regard to you if you
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: are bent on pursuing war; and the land will be ruined by reason
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: thereof." Therefore they counsel him to seek such a peace as may
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: be reasonable and honourable; and that the one make no
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: unreasonable demands on the other. Now Alis hears that if he does
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: not make a fair covenant with his brother, all the barons will
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: desert him; and he said they will never desire an arrangement
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: which he cannot equitably make; but he establishes in the
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: covenant that whate'er the outcome of the matter the crown remain
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: to him.
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: In order to make firm and lasting peace Alis sends one of his
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: masters-at-arms and bids Alexander come to him and rule all the
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: land; but that he do Alis so much honour as to allow him to keep
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: the name of emperor and let him have the crown; thus, if he will,
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: can this covenant be made 'twixt the twain of them. When this
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: thing was related and told to Alexander, his folk have mounted
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: with him and have come to Athens. With joy were they received;
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: but it does not please Alexander that his brother should have the
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: lordship of the empire and of the crown if he give him not his
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: promise that never will he wed woman; but that after him, Cliges
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: shall be emperor of Constantinople. Thus are the brothers
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: reconciled. Alexander makes him swear; and Alis grants and
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: warrants him that never as long as he shall live will he take
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: wife. They are reconciled and remain friends. The barons manifest
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: great joy; they take Alis for emperor; but before Alexander come
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: affairs great and small. Whatever he commands and says is done;
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: and little is done except through him. Alis has no longer
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: anything but the name--for he is called emperor--but Alexander is
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: served and loved; and he who does not serve him through love,
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: must needs do so through fear. By means of love and fear he rules
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: all the land according to his will. But he whose name is Death
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: spares no man, weak or strong, but slays and kills them all.
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: Alexander was destined to die; for a sickness for which there was
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: no remedy took him in its grip; but before death came upon him he
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: sent for his son and said: "Fair son, Cliges, never canst thou
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: know how much prowess and valour thou shalt have if thou go not
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: first to prove thyself at King Arthur's court on both the Britons
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: and the French. If fate lead thee thither, so bear and demean
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: thyself that thou remain unknown till thou hast proved thyself on
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: the flower of the knighthood at the court. I counsel thee that
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: thou believe me in this matter; and that if opportunity comes
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: thou fear not to put thy fortune to the test with thy uncle, my
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: Lord Gawain. Prithee forget not this."
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: After this exhortation he lived not long. Soredamors had such
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: grief thereat that she could not live after him. For sheer grief
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: she died when he died. Alis and Cliges both mourned for them as
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: they were bound; but in time they ceased to mourn. For all
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: mourning must come to an end; all things needs must cease. Ill is
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: it to prolong mourning, for no good can come of it. The mourning
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: has ceased; and for a long time after the emperor has refrained
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: from taking wife, for he would fain strive after loyalty. But
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: there is no court in all the world that is pure from evil
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: counsel. Nobles often leave the right way through the evil
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: counsels to which they give credence, so that they do not keep
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: loyalty. Often do his men come to the emperor, and they give him
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: counsel, and exhort him to take a wife. So much do they exhort
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: and urge him, and each day do they so much beset him, that
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: through their great importunity, they have turned him from his
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: loyalty, and he promises to do their will. But he says that she
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: who is to be lady of Constantinople must needs be very graceful
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: and fair and wise, rich and of high degree. Then his counsellors
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: say to him that they will make ready and will hie them into the
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: German land to sue for the daughter of the emperor. They counsel
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: him to take her; for the emperor of Germany is very mighty and
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: very powerful and his daughter is so fair that never in
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: them all their suit; and they set out on the way like folk well
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: equipped. They have ridden in their days' journeys until they
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: found the emperor at Ratisbon, and asked him to give his elder
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: daughter for their lord's behalf.
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: The emperor was full blithe at this embassy and gladly has he
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: promised them his daughter; for he in no wise abases himself by
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: so doing and abates not one jot of his dignity. But he says that
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: he had promised to give her to the Duke of Saxony; and that the
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: Greeks could not take her away unless the emperor came and
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: brought a mighty force, so that the duke could not do him hurt or
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: injury on the way back to Greece.
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: When the messengers had heard the emperor's reply they take their
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: leave and set out once more for home. They have returned to their
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: lord and have told him the reply. And the emperor has taken
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: chosen men, knights proven in arms, the best that he has found,
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: and he takes with him his nephew, for whose sake he had vowed

author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: appointed he departs from Greece and shapes his course towards

author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: a wife. But his honour will wane thereby. He does not stop till
title: Cliges: A Romance

author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: for a festival held for all Germany. When the company of the
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: Greeks had come to Cologne there were so many Greeks and so many
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: quarters outside the town.
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: Great was the gathering of folk, and very great was the joy that
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: the two emperors showed, for they were right glad to meet face to
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: face. In the palace which was very long was the assembly of the

author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: her; for it pleased Him greatly to show such workmanship as to
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

title: Cliges: A Romance

text: Fenice was the maiden named, and not without reason; for just as

text: for beauty. It was a wonder and a marvel, for never again could

title: Cliges: A Romance

text: palace than four carbuncles would have done. Now Cliges had
title: Cliges: A Romance

author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: was somewhat cloudy but so beauteous were the twain, both the

author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: maid and he, that there shot forth from their beauty a ray with
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: which the palace glowed again, just as the sun shines bright and
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: ruddy in the morning.
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: To describe the beauty of Cliges I will limn you a portrait, the
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: traits of which shall be very briefly told. He was in the flower
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: of his youth, for he was about fifteen years old. He was fairer
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: and more comely than Narcissus' who saw his own reflection in the
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: fountain beneath the elm, and loved it so much when he saw it
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: that he died--so folk say--because he could not have it. Much
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: beauty had he, and little wit, but Cliges had greater store of
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: both, just as fine gold surpasses copper, and yet more than I can
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: say. His hair seemed like fine gold and his face a fresh-blown
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: rose. His nose was well shaped, and his mouth beautiful, and he
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: was of great stature as Nature best knew how to frame him; for in
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: him alone she put all at once what she is wont to dole out to
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: each in portions. In framing him Nature was so lavish that she
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: put everything into him all at once and gave him whatsoever she
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: could. Such was Cliges who had in him wisdom and beauty,
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: generosity and strength. He had the timber together with the
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: bark, and knew more of fencing and of archery, of birds and of
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: hounds, than Tristram, King Mark's nephew; not one grace was
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: lacking to Cliges.
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: Cliges in all his beauty was standing before his uncle; and those
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: who did not know him were in a fever to see him; and also those
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: who do not know the maiden are eagerly straining to see her; all
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: look at her with wonder; but Cliges, in love, directs his eyes to
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: her secretly, and withdraws them so prudently that neither in the
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: going or the coming of the gaze can one consider him a fool for
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: his action. Right lovingly he regards her; but he does not pay
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: heed to the fact that the maiden pays him back in kind. In true
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: receives hers. Right good seems this exchange to her; and it
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: would have seemed to her far better if she had known somewhat of
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: his worth. But she knows no more than that she sees him fair; and
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: if she were ever destined to love aught because of the beauty
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: that she might see in it, it is not meet that she should set her
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: heart elsewhere. She has set her eyes and her heart there; and he
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: in his turn has promised her his. Promised? Nay, but given for
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: good and all. Given? Nay, in faith, I lie; he has not, for no
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: one can give his heart. Needs must I say it in a different
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: fashion. I will not speak as they speak who join two hearts in
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: one body; for it is not true, and has not even the semblance of
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: truth to say that one body can have two hearts at once. And even
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: if they could come together such a thing could not be believed.
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: But, and it please you to hearken to me, I shall be able well to
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: render you the reason why two hearts blend in one without coming
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: together. In so far as only they blend in one, the will of each
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: passes from one to the other, and the twain have the same desire,
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: and because they have the same desire, there are folk who are
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: wont to say that each of them possesses both the hearts. But one
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: heart is not in two places. Well may their desire be the same,
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: and yet each, always, his own heart, just as many different men
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: can sing in harmony one song or verse; and I prove to you by this
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: parable that one body cannot have two hearts because one knows
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: the other's will, or because the second knows what the first
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: loves and what he hates. A body cannot have more than one heart
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: any more than the voices which sing in harmony, so that they seem
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: to be but a single voice, can be the voice of one person alone.
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: But it profits me not to dwell on this; for another task demands
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: my care. Henceforth I must speak of the maiden and of Cliges; and
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: ye shall hear of the Duke of Saxony who has sent to Cologne a
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

title: Cliges: A Romance

title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

title: Cliges: A Romance

text: if she is not given up to the duke.

author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

title: Cliges: A Romance

title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

title: Cliges: A Romance

title: Cliges: A Romance
