text: "Nurse," quoth she, "of a truth I thought that I felt no ill; but
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: I shall speedily think that I am sick. The mere fact of my
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: thinking of it causes me much ill and eke alarms me. But how does
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: one know unless he put it to the test what may be good and what
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: ill? My ill differs from all other ills; for--and I be willing to
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: tell you the truth of it--much it joys me, and much it grieves
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: me, and I delight in my discomfort; and if there can be a disease
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: which gives pleasure, my sorrow is my desire, and my grief is my
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: health. I know not then whereof I should complain; for I know
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: nought whence evil may come to me if it come not from my desire.
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: Possibly my desire is a malady; but I take so much pleasure in
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: that desire that it causes me a pleasant grief; and I have so
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: much joy in my sorrow that my malady is a pleasant one. Thessala,
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: nurse! tell me now, is not this sorrow which seems sweet to me,
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: and yet which tortures me, a deceitful one? I know not how I may
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: recognise whether it be an infirmity or no. Nurse! tell me now
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: the name, and the manner, and the nature, of it. But be well
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: assured that I have no care to recover in any wise, for I cherish
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: the anguish of it exceedingly." Thessala, who was right wise as
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: regards Love and all his ways, knows and understands by her
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: speech that that which distracts her proceeds from Love--because
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: she calls and names it sweet--it is certain that she loves; for
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: all other ills are bitter save that alone which comes from
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: loving; but Love transmutes its own bitterness into pleasure, and
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: sweetness often turns to its opposite. But Thessala, who well
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: knew the matter, replies to her: "Fear nought, I will tell you
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: well both the nature and the name of your disease. You have told
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: me, methinks, that the pain which you feel seems to you to be joy
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: and health: of such a nature is love-sickness; for there is in it
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: joy and sweetness. Therefore I prove to you that you love; for I
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: find pleasure in no sickness save only in love-sickness. All
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: other ills as a rule are always grievous and horrible; but Love
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: is pleasant and tranquil. You love; I am fully certain of it. I
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: regard it not as base in you; but I will hold it baseness if
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: through childishness or folly you conceal your heart from me."
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: "Nurse, truly you are talking to no purpose; for first I mean to
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: be certain and sure that never by any chance will you speak
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: thereof to any living creature." "Lady, certainly the winds will
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: speak of it sooner than I unless you give me permission; and of
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: this I will make you sure--that I will help you with regard to
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: this matter, so that you may know of a surety, that by me you
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: will have your joy." "Nurse, in that case you would have cured
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: me; but the emperor is giving me in marriage whereat I am
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: grievously afflicted and sad because he who pleases me is nephew
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: of him whom I am to wed. And if this man have his joy of me, then
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: have I lost mine; and there is no more joy to be looked for.
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: Rather would I be torn limb from limb than that the love of
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: Iseult and of Tristram should be renewed in the case of us twain;
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: for of them are such mad actions told that I am ashamed to
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: recount them. I could not reconcile myself to the life that
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: Iseult led. Love in her became exceeding base; for her body
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: belonged to two masters and her heart entirely to one. Thus she
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: spent her whole life; for she never refused the two. Reason was
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: there none in this love; but mine is ever constant; and at no
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: cost will a partition ever be made of my body or of my heart.
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: Never of a truth shall my body be debased; never shall there be
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: two partners of it. Let him who owns the heart have the body
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: also; he excludes all others from it. But this I cannot know--how
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: he to whom my heart yields itself can have my body since my
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: father is giving me to another; and I dare not gainsay him. And
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: when he shall be lord of my body if he do aught with it that I do
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: not wish, it is not meet that it welcome another. Moreover, this
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: man cannot wed wife without breaking faith; but if he wrong not
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: his nephew, Cliges will have the empire after his death. But if
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: you can contrive by your arts, that this man to whom I am given
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: and pledged might never have part or lot in me, you would have
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: done me good service according to my will. Nurse, prithee strive
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: that this man break not his faith; for he gave his pledge to the
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: father of Cliges, promising just as Alexander had made him swear,
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: that never would he take wedded wife. His pledge is about to be
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: broken, for straightway he intends to wed me. But I cherish
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: Cliges so dearly that I would rather be buried than that he
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: should lose through me a farthing of the inheritance which ought
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: to be his. May never child be born of me by whom he may be
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: disinherited! Nurse, now bestir yourself in the matter that I may
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: be yours for ever." Then her nurse tells her and assures her that
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: she will weave such spells and potions and enchantments that she
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: would be ill-advised to have concern or fear for this emperor; so
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: soon as he shall have drunk of the potion that she will give him
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: to drink, and they will both lie together; but however close she
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: will be to him, she can be as secure as if there were a wall
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: between the two of them. "But let not this and this only vex you
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: if he has his pleasure of you in dreams; for, when he shall be
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: sound asleep, he will have joy of you in dreaming; and will quite
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: surely think that he has his joy of you waking, nor will he
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: imagine that it is a dream, or vision, or falsehood. He will
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: delight in you so that he will think he is awake while he is
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: sleeping."
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: The maiden loves and approves and esteems this boon and this
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: service. Her nurse, who promises her this, and vows to keep faith
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: with her, puts her in good hope; for by this means she will think
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: to come to her joy however long she have to wait. For never will
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: Cliges be so ill-disposed to her--if he knows that she loves him;
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: and for his sake lives so as to guard her maidenhead in order to
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: shield for him his inheritance--as not to have some pity on her
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: if he prove himself of a noble stock, and if he is such as he
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: ought to be. The maiden believes her nurse, and trusts and
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: confides in her greatly. The one vows and swears to the other
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: that this plan will be kept so secret that never will it be known
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: in the future. Thus the parley is ended; and when it came to the
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: morning the emperor of Germany sends for his daughter. She comes
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: at his command--but why should I spin out my story? The two
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: emperors together have so arranged matters that the marriage
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: takes place and joy begins in the palace. But I will not delay to
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: speak of each thing severally. I will turn my tale of Thessala,
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: who does not cease to make and mix potions.
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: Thessala crushes her potion; she puts therein spices in plenty
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: for sweetening and blending. Well does she pound and mix it, and
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: strains it till the whole is clear, and there is nought acid nor
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: bitter there; for the spices which are in it make it sweet and of
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: pleasant odour. When the potion was prepared, then had the day
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: run its course, and the tables were placed for supper, and the
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: tablecloths laid; but she delays the supper. It is Thessala's
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: task to spy out by what device, by what messenger, she will send
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: her potion. They were all seated at the banquet; they had had
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: more than six courses and Cliges was serving his uncle. Thessala,
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: who sees him serve, reflects that he is wasting his Service; for
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: he is serving to his own disinheritance, and this is a great
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: sorrow and anxiety to her. Then like the courteous dame that she
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: is, she bethinks herself that she will make him to whom it will
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: be joy and profit serve the potion. Thessala sends for Cliges,
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: and he went straightway to her, and has inquired, and asked of
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: her why she had sent for him. "Friend," quoth she, "at this
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: banquet I wish to pay the emperor the flattering meed of a potion
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: that he will greatly esteem. I will not that he drink to-night,
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: either at supper or at bedtime, of any other drink. I think that
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: it will give him much pleasure; for never did he taste of aught
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: so good nor did any beverage ever cost so much; and take good
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: care--I warn you of this--that no other drink of it because there
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: is too little of it for that. And, moreover, I give you this
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: advice, that he never know whence it came; but let him think it
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: came by accident, that you found it among the presents, and that
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: because you tested it, and perceived by the scent of its bouquet
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: the fragrance of good spices, and because you saw that it
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: sparkled, you poured the wine into his cup. If by chance he
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: inquire of it, that will doubtless be the end of the matter. But
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: have no evil suspicion anent aught that I have said; for the
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: beverage is pure and wholesome, and full of good spices, and it
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: may be, as I think, that at some future time it will make you
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: blithe." When he hears that good will come of it he takes the
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: potion and goes away; for he knows not that there is aught wrong.
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: In a cup of crystal he has set it before the emperor. The emperor
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: has taken the cup, for he has great trust in his nephew. He
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: drinks a mighty draught of the potion; and now he feels the
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: virtue of it; for it penetrates from the head to the heart, and
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: from the heart it returns to his head, and it permeates him again
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: and again. It saturates his whole body without hurting him. And
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: by the time the tables were removed, the emperor had drunk so
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: much of the beverage which had pleased him, that never will he
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: get free of it. Each night while asleep he will be intoxicated;
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: and yet it will excite him so much that though asleep, he will
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: dream that he is awake.
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: Now is the emperor mocked. Many bishops and abbots there were at
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: the benediction and consecration of the bed. When it was bedtime
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: the emperor, as it behoved him, lay with his wife that night. "As
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: it behoved him"--therein have I lied, for he never embraced or
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: touched her though they lay together in one bed. At first the
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: maiden trembles; for greatly does she fear and feel alarm lest
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: the potion take no effect. But it has so bewitched him that never
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: will he have his will of her or of another save when asleep. But
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: then he will have such ecstasy as one can have in dreaming; and
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: yet he will hold the dream for true. In one word I have told you
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: all: never had he other delight of her than in dreams. Thus must
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: he needs fare evermore if he can lead his bride away; but before
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: he can hold her in safety a great disaster, I ween, may befall
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: him. For when he will return home, the duke, to whom she was
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: first given, will be no laggard. The duke has gathered a great
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: force, and has occupied all the marches, and his spies are at the
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: court, and inform him each day of all he wants to know, and tell
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: him all the measures he must take, and how long they will tarry,
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: and when they will return, through what places, and by what
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: passes. The emperor did not long tarry after the wedding.
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: Blithely he departs from Cologne; and the emperor of Germany
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: escorts him with a very great company because he greatly fears
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: and dreads the might of the Duke of Saxony.
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: The two emperors proceed and stop not till they reach Ratisbon;
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: and on one evening they were lodged by the Danube in the meadow.
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: The Greeks were in their tents in the meadows beside the Black
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: Forest. The Saxons who were observing them were encamped opposite
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: them. The duke's nephew was left all alone on a hill to keep a
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: look-out, and see whether, peradventure, he might gain any
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: advantage over those yonder or wreak any mischief upon them.
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: From his post of vantage he saw Cliges riding with three other
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: striplings who were taking their pleasure, carrying lances and
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: shields in order to tilt and to disport themselves. Now is the
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: duke's nephew bent on attacking and injuring them if ever he can.
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: With five comrades he sets out; and the six have posted
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: themselves secretly beside the wood in a valley, so that the
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: Greeks never saw them till they issued from the valley, and till
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: the duke's nephew rushes upon Cliges and strikes him, so that he
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: wounds him a little in the region of the spine. Cliges stoops and
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: bows his head, so that the lance glances off him; nevertheless,
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: it wounds him a little.
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: When Cliges perceives that he is wounded he has rushed upon the
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: stripling, and strikes him straightway with such violence that he
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: thrusts his lance right through his heart and fells him dead.
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: Then the Saxons, who fear him mightily, all take to flight and
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: scatter through the heart of the forest while Cliges, who knows
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: not of the ambush, commits a reckless and foolish act; for he
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: separates himself from his comrades, and pursues in that
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: direction in which the duke's force was. And now all the host
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: were preparing to make an attack on the Greeks. Cliges, all
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: alone, without aid, pursues them; and the youths all dismayed
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: because of their lord whom they have lost, come running into the
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: duke's presence; and, weeping, recount to him the evil hap of his
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: nephew. The duke thinks it no light matter; by God and all his
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: saints, he swears that never in all his life will he have joy or
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: good luck as long as he shall know that the slayer of his nephew
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: is alive. He says that he who will bring him Cliges' head shall
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: verily be deemed his friend, and will give him great comfort.
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: Then a knight has boasted that the head of Cliges will be offered
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: to the duke by him; let the duke but rely on him.
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: Cliges pursues the youths till he swooped down on the Saxons, and
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: is seen by the knight who has engaged to carry off his head.
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: Straightway, that knight departs and stays no longer. But Cliges
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: has retreated in order to elude his enemies; and he returned at
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: full gallop thither where he had left his comrades. But he has
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: found none of them there; for they had returned to the tents to
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: relate their adventure. And the emperor summoned Greeks and
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: Germans alike to horse. Through all the host the barons speedily
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: arm themselves and mount. But the Saxon knight, all armed, his
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: visor laced, has continued to pursue Cliges at a gallop. Cliges,
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: who never wished to have aught in common with a recreant or
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: coward, sees him come alone. First of all the knight has assailed
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: him with words: he stoutly calls him baseborn fellow, for he
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: could not conceal the mind he had of him. "Fellow," quoth he,
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: "here wilt thou leave the forfeit for my lord, whom thou hast
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: slain. If I bear not off thy head with me, then esteem me not
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: worth a bad Byzantine coin. I will to make the duke a present of
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: it, for I will not accept any other forfeit in its stead. So much
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: will I render to him for his nephew; and he will have had a good
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: exchange for him." Cliges hears that the Saxon is abusing him as
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: a madman and low-bred fellow. "Man," quoth he, "now defend
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: yourself; for I defy you to take my head, and you shall not have
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: it without my leave." Forthwith the one seeks the other. The
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: Saxon has missed his stroke; and Cliges thrusts so hard that he
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: made man and steed fall all in a heap. The steed falls backwards
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: on his rider with such violence that it completely breaks one of
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: his legs. Cliges dismounts on the green grass and disarms him.
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: When he had disarmed him, then he dons the arms himself, and has
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: cut off his head with the victim's own sword. When he had cut off
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: his head, he has fixed it on to the point of his lance; and says
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: that he will present it to the duke to whom his enemy had vowed
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: to present Cliges' own head if he could meet him in the fight. No
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: sooner had Cliges placed the helmet on his head, taken the shield,
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: (not his own, but the shield of him who had fought with him),
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: and no sooner had he mounted on the foeman's horse, leaving his
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: own rider-less in order to dismay the Greeks, than he saw more
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: than a hundred banners and battalions, great and fully equipped,
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: of Greeks and Germans mingled. Now will begin a very fierce and
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: cruel melee between the Saxons and the Greeks. As soon as Cliges
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: sees them come, he goes straight towards the Saxons; and the
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: Greeks exert themselves to pursue him; for on account of his arms
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: they do not know him; and his uncle, who sees the head that he is
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: bringing, is marvellously discomforted thereat. No wonder is it
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: if he fears for his nephew. The whole host musters in his wake;
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: and Cliges lets them pursue him in order to begin the melee till
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: the Saxons perceive him coming; but the arms with which he is
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: clad and furnished mislead them all. He has mocked at them and
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: scorned them; for the duke and all the others as he advanced with
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: hoisted lance, say: "Our knight is coming! On the point of the
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: lance that he holds he is bringing the head of Cliges; and the
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: Greeks follow after him. Now to horse to succour him!" Then they
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: all give the rein to their horses; and Cliges spurs towards the
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: Saxons, covering himself behind his shield and doubling himself
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: up, his lance upright, the head on its point. Not one whit less
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: courage than a lion had he, though he was no stronger than
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: another. On both sides they believe that he is dead--Saxons, and
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: Greeks and Germans--and the one side are blithe thereat; and the
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: other side, grieved; but soon will the truth be known. For now
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: has Cliges no longer held his peace: shouting, he gallops towards
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: a Saxon, and strikes him with his ashen lance with the head on
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: it, full in the breast, so that he has lost his stirrups; and he
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: calls out, "Barons, strike! I am Cliges whom you seek. On now,
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: bold freeborn knights! Let there be no coward, for ours is the
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: first shock. Let no craven taste of such a dainty dish."
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: The emperor greatly rejoiced when he heard his nephew, Cliges,
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: who thus addresses and exhorts them; right glad and comforted is
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: he thereof. And the duke is utterly dumfounded, for now he knows
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: well that he is betrayed unless his force is the greater; he bids
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: his men close their ranks and keep together. And the Greeks, in
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: close array, have not gone far from them, for now they are
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: spurring and pricking. On both sides they couch their lances and
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: meet and receive each other as it behoved them to do in such a
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: fight. At the first encounter, they pierce shields and shatter
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: lances, cut girths, break stirrups; the steeds stand bereft of
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: those who fall upon the field. But no matter what the others do,
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: Cliges and the duke meet; they hold their lances couched; and
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: each strikes the other on his shield with so great valour that
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: the lances, which were strong and well wrought, break into
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: splinters. Cliges was a skilful horseman: he remained upright in
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: his saddle, never stumbling nor wavering. The duke has lost his
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: saddle, and in spite of himself has voided the saddle-bows.
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: Cliges thinks to take him and lead him away captive, and mightily
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: toils and strains; but the strength he needed was not his. For
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: the Saxons were all around, and they rescue their duke by force.
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: Nevertheless, Cliges leaves the field without injury; with a
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: prize; for he leads away the duke's steed which was whiter than
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: wool and which, for the use of a man of valour, was worth all the
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: possessions of Octavian of Rome: the steed was an Arab one. Great
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: joy manifest Greeks and Germans when they see Cliges mounted on
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: it; for they had seen the worth and the perfection of the Arab;
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: but they did not suspect an ambush nor will they ever perceive it
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: till they receive great loss therefrom.
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: A spy has come to the duke with news at which he has waxed full
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: joyous. "Duke," quoth the spy, "no man has been left in all the
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: tents of the Greeks who can defend himself. Now can thy men take
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: the daughter of the emperor, if thou wilt trust my words, while
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: thou seest the Greeks desperately bent on the fight and on the
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: battle. Give me a hundred of thy knights and I will give them thy
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: lady-love. By an old and lonely path, I will lead them so
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: prudently that they shall not be seen or met by Saxon or German
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: till they will be able to take the maiden in her tent, and lead
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: her away so unhindered that never will she be denied them." The
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: duke is blithe at this thing. He has sent a hundred and more wise
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: knights with the spy; and the spy has led them in such wise that
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: they take the maiden as a prize, nor have they spent great force
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: thereon, for easily were they able to lead her away. When they
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: had taken her some distance from the tents, they sent her away
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: attended by twelve of them, nor did the rest accompany the twelve
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: far. Twelve of them lead away the maiden; the others have told
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: the duke the news of their success. Nought else was there that
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: the duke had desired, and straightway he makes a truce with the
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: Greeks till the morrow. They have given and accepted a truce. The
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: duke's men have returned; and the Greeks without any delay return,
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: each one to his tent. But Cliges remained alone on a hill so
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: that no one noticed him till he saw the twelve coming, and the
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: damsel whom they were taking away at full speed and at a gallop.
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: Cliges, who longs to gain renown, forthwith dashes in their
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: direction, for he thinks to himself, and his heart tells him that
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: it is not for nothing they are fleeing. The very moment that he
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: saw them, he dashes after them; and they see him; but they think
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: and believe a foolish thing. "The duke is following us," each one
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: says, "let us wait for him a little; for he has left the host
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: unattended and is coming after us very swiftly." There is not a
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: single one who does not believe this. They all desire to go to
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: meet him; but each desires to go alone. Cliges must needs descend
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: into a great valley between two mountains. Never would he have
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: recognised their insignia if they had not come to meet him, or if
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: they had not awaited him. Six of them advanced to meet him; but
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: soon will they have had an ill meeting with him. The others stay
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: with the maiden and lead her on, gently, at a walking pace. And
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: the six go at full speed, spurring incessantly through the
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: valley. He who had the swiftest horse outstripped all the rest,
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: crying aloud: "Duke of Saxony! God preserve thee! Duke! We have
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: regained thy lady. Now shall the Greeks never carry her off; for
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: she will now be given and handed over to thee." When Cliges has
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: heard these words that the other cries out, no smile had he in
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: his heart; rather is it a marvel that frenzy does not seize him.
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: Never was any wild beast: leopardess, or tigress, or lioness, who
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: sees her young taken, so embittered, and furious, and lusting,
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: for the fight as was Cliges who cares not to live if he fail his
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: lady. Rather would he die than not have her. Very great wrath has
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: he for this calamity and exceeding great courage does it give
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: him. He spurs and pricks the Arab; and goes to deal the blazoned
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: shield of the Saxon such a blow that--I lie not--he made him feel
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: the lance at his heart. This has given Cliges confidence. More
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: than a full acre's measure has he spurred and pricked the Arab
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: before the second has drawn near, for they came, one by one. The
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: one has no fear for the other; for he fights with each singly and
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: meets them one by one, nor has the one aid of the other. He makes
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: an attack on the second, who thought to tell the supposed duke
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: news of Cliges' discomfiture, and to rejoice thereat as the first
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: had done. But Cliges recks little of words or of listening to his
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: discourse. He proceeds to thrust his lance in his body so that
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: when he draws it out again the blood gushes out; and he bereaves
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: his foe of life and speech. After the two, he joins issue with a
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: third who thinks to find him overjoyed and to gladden him with
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: news of his own discomfiture. He came spurring against him; but
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: before he has the chance to say a word, Cliges has thrust his
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: lance a fathom deep into his body. To the fourth he gives such a
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: blow on the neck, that he leaves him in a swoon on the field.
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: After the fourth, he gallops against the fifth, and then after
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: the fifth, against the sixth. Of these, none stood his ground
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: against him; rather does Cliges leave them all silent and dumb.
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: Still less has he feared and more boldly sought the rest of them.
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: After this has he no concern about these six.
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: When he was free from care as regards these, he goes to make a
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: present of shame and of misfortune to the rest who are escorting
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: the maiden. He has overtaken them, and attacks them like a wolf,
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: who famished and fasting rushes on his prey. Now seems it to him
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: that he was born in a good hour, since he can display his
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: chivalry and courage before her who is all his life. Now is he
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: dead if he free her not; and she, on the other hand, is likewise
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: dead; for she is greatly discomforted for him, but does not know
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: that he is so near her. Cliges, with feutred lance, has made a
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: charge which pleased her; and he strikes one Saxon and then
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: another so that with one single charge he has made them both bite
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: the dust, and splinters his ashen lance. The foemen fall in such
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: anguish that they have no power to rise again to hurt or molest
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: him, for they were sore wounded in their bodies. The other four,
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: in great wrath, go all together to strike Cliges; but he neither
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: stumbles nor trembles nor have they unhorsed him. Swiftly he
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: snatches from the scabbard his sword of sharpened Steel; and that
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: she who awaits his love may be right grateful to him, he
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: encounters with lightning swiftness a Saxon, and strikes him with
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: his sharp sword, so that he has severed from his trunk, his head
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: and half his neck: no tenderer pity had he for him. Fenice, who
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: watches and beholds, knows not that it is Cliges. Fain would she
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: that it were he; but because there is danger she says to herself
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: that she would not wish it. For two reasons is she his good
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: friend; for she fears his death and desires his honour. And
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: Cliges receives at the sword's point the three who offer him
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: fierce combat; they pierce and cleave his shield, but they cannot
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: get him into their power or cleave the links of his shirt of
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: mail. And nought that Cliges can reach stands firm before his
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: blow; for he cleaves and breaks asunder all; he wheels round more
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: quickly than the top which is urged on and driven by the whip.
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: Prowess and love entwine him and make him bold and keen in fight.
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: He has dealt so grievously with the Saxons that he has killed or
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: conquered them all, wounded some, and killed others; but he let
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: one of them escape because they were a match, one for the other,
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: and so that, by him, the duke might know his loss and mourn. But
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: before this man left him, he prevailed upon Cliges to tell him
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: his name; and went for his part to tell it to the duke, who had
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: great wrath thereat. Now the duke hears of his misfortune, and
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: had great grief and great care thereat. And Cliges leads away
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: Fenice, who thrills and tortures him with the pangs of love; but
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: if now he does not hear her confession, long time will love be
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: adverse to him; and also to her if she, on her side, is silent
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: and say not her will; for now in the hearing, one of the other,
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: can they reveal their inmost hearts. But so much do they fear
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: refusal that they dare not betray their hearts. He fears that she
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: might reject him; she, on her part, would have betrayed herself
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: if she had not feared rejection. And, nevertheless, the one
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: betrays his thoughts to the other with the eyes if they could
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: only have known it. They speak by glances with their eyes; but
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: they are so craven with their tongues that in no wise dare they
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: speak of the love which masters them. If she dare not begin it,
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: it is no marvel; for a maiden ought to be a simple and shy
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: creature. But why does he wait; and why does he delay, who is
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: thoroughly bold in her behalf, and has shown dread of none but
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: her? God! Whence comes this fear to him that he fears a single
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: maiden, weak and timid, simple and shy? At this, methinks, I see
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: dogs fleeing before the hare, and the fish hunting the beaver,
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: the lamb the wolf, the dove the eagle. So would it be if the
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: villein were to flee before his hoe by which he gains his
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: livelihood, and with which he toils. So would it be if the falcon
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: were to flee from the duck, and the gerfalcon from the heron, and
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: the great pike from the minnow, and if the stag were to chase the
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: lion; so do things go topsy-turvy. But a desire comes upon me to
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: give some reason why it happens to true lovers, that wit and
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: courage fail them to express what they have in their thoughts
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: when they have leisure and opportunity and time.
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: You who are being instructed in Love, who faithfully uphold the
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: customs and rites of his court, and who never broke his law
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: whatever might have befallen you for your obedience, tell me if
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: one can see anything which affords Love's delight but that lovers
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: shiver and grow pale thereat. Never shall there be a man opposed
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: to me that I do not convince of this; for he who does not grow
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: pale and shiver thereat, who does not lose wit and memory like a
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: thief, pursues and seeks that which is not fittingly his. A
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: servant who does not fear his lord, ought not to stay in his
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: retinue or serve him. He who does not esteem his lord, does not
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: fear him; and he who does not esteem him, does not hold him dear;
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: but rather seeks to cheat him and to pilfer somewhat of his
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: property. For fear ought a servant to tremble when his lord calls
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: him or sends for him. And he who commends himself to Love makes
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: Love his master and his lord; and it is meet that he have him in
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: Reverence; and greatly fear and honour him if he wishes to stand
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: well with his court. Love without fear and without dread is fire
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: without flame and without heat; daylight without sun; honeycomb
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: without honey; summer without flowers; winter without frost; sky
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: without moon; a book without letters. Thus do I wish to refute
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: such an opponent; for where fear is lacking there is no love
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: worth mentioning. It behoves him who wishes to love to fear also;
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: for if he does not he cannot love; but let him fear her only whom
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: he loves; and in her behoof let him be thoroughly bold.
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: Therefore, Cliges commits no fault or wrong if he fears his
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: lady-love. But for this fear he would not have failed forthwith
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: to have spoken to her of love and sought her love, however the
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: matter had happed if she had not been his uncle's wife. For this
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: cause his wound rankles in him; and it pains and grieves him the
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: more because he dare not say what he yearns to say.
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: Thus they return towards their company; and if they talk of
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: anything, there was in their talk nothing about which they cared.
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: where there was great lamentation. Throughout the host they are
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: beside themselves with grief; but they hit upon an untrue saying
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: when they say that Cliges is dead--thereat is the mourning very
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: great and loud. And they fear for Fenice; they deem not that they
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: will ever have her again; and both for her and for him the whole
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: host is in very great sorrow. But these two will not delay much
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: longer; and the whole state of matters will take a different
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: appearance; for already they have returned to the host and have
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: turned the sorrow into joy. Joy returns and sorrow flies. They
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: all come to meet them so that the whole host assembles. The two
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: emperors together, when they heard the news about Cliges and
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: about the maiden, go to meet them with very great joy; but each
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: one longs to hear how Cliges had found and rescued the lady.
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: Cliges tells them the tale; and those who hear it marvel greatly
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: Thereat; and much do they praise his prowess and valour. But on
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: the other side the duke, who swears and protests, is furious; and
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: declares that if Cliges dares there shall be a single combat
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: between the two of them; and that he will order matters in such
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: wise, that if Cliges wins the combat, the emperor shall go away
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: in safety, and take the maiden unhindered; but that if he kills
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: or conquers Cliges, who has done him many an injury, let there
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: for this be neither truce nor peace till after each has done his
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: utmost. This the duke essays; and through an interpreter of his,
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: who knew Greek and German, gives the two emperors to know that
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: thus he wishes to have the battle.
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: The messenger delivers his message in one and the other language
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: so well that all understood. The whole host resounds and is in an
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: uproar about it; and men say, that never may it please God, that
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: Cliges fight the battle; and both the emperors are in a very
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: great alarm thereat; but Cliges falls at their feet and prays
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: them let it not grieve them; but that, if ever he has done aught
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: that has pleased them, he may have this battle as a guerdon and
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: as a reward. And if it is denied him never will he for a single
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: day be a blessing and an honour to his uncle. The emperor, who
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: held his nephew as dear as duty bade him, with his hand raises
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: him up from his knees and says: "Fair nephew, greatly does it

author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: grieve me that I know you to be so wedded to fighting; for after

title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: that it please you to ask; for know well that it would be done

text: but to please you; but if my prayer availed aught, never would

author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: you take on you this burden." "Sire, you are pleading in vain,"
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: quoth Cliges, "for may God confound me if I would accept the
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: whole world on condition that I did not fight this battle. I know

text: not why I should seek from you a long respite or a long delay."

title: Cliges: A Romance

text: joy when he grants him the battle. There had he wept many a
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: joyful tear, nor had he secured delay, nor limit of time, before
title: Cliges: A Romance

author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: announced to the duke, just as he had demanded it.

title: Cliges: A Romance

text: not be able to defend himself against him, but that he will soon

text: have slain or conquered him, quickly has himself armed. Cliges,

text: who is longing for the battle, thinks that he need have no care

title: Cliges: A Romance

title: Cliges: A Romance

title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

title: Cliges: A Romance

title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: the sword on his side. Cliges mounts on the white Arab, fully
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: elephant's bone, such that it will neither break nor split nor
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

title: Cliges: A Romance

title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

text: Cliges and the duke are armed, and the one has announced to the
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

title: Cliges: A Romance

title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

title: Cliges: A Romance

text: eye. Bound by this covenant they have met, and the delay has
title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

title: Cliges: A Romance
author: Chrétien, de Troyes, active 12th century

title: Cliges: A Romance
